documentTemplateSection.title: Known Medications
documentTemplateSection.sectionHint: Please note: This information is collected externally.

section.name: WICSummaryOfTreatment
section.defaultTitle: W I C Summary Of Treatment
section.query: SELECT DISTINCT TMT.Comments_XOMI0 FROM v2_WIC#TreatmentForm_4HDAY TMT INNER JOIN v2_WICTrFr_4HDAY_FnClIm_C7COZ DTL ON TMT.v2_WIC#TreatmentForm_4HDAY = DTL.v2_WIC#TreatmentForm_4HDAY INNER JOIN v_Document DOC ON DOC.documentId = TMT.DOCUMENTID WHERE DOC.documentId = (SELECT TOP 1 META.DOCUMENTID As DocumentID FROM dbo.v2_DocumentMetaData_0Z14K META INNER JOIN dbo.DocumentIdentifier DI on DI.DOCUMENTID = META.DOCUMENTID INNER JOIN dbo.v_Document FINFO ON FINFO.DocumentId = META.DocumentId INNER JOIN dbo.v2_DcmMtDt_0Z14K_p_ptnId_6KYRZ PMD on META.v2_DocumentMetaData_0Z14K = PMD.v2_DocumentMetaData_0Z14K WHERE META.status_TDES0 = 'Final' AND PMD.idNumber_9LV7R = '<%=PatientId%>' ORDER BY dateadd(minute,FINFO.dateSubmitted_Ofst,FINFO.dateSubmitted) DESC) AND TMT.Comments_XOMI0 IS NOT NULL

section.name: Assessment
section.query: SELECT NA.FullSummary_49U#$ FROM v2_WIC#NursingAssessment_IIZ1$ NA INNER JOIN v_Document DOC ON DOC.documentId = NA.DOCUMENTID WHERE DOC.documentId = (SELECT TOP 1 META.DOCUMENTID As DocumentID FROM dbo.v2_DocumentMetaData_0Z14K META INNER JOIN dbo.DocumentIdentifier DI on DI.DOCUMENTID = META.DOCUMENTID INNER JOIN dbo.v_Document FINFO ON FINFO.DocumentId = META.DocumentId INNER JOIN dbo.v2_DcmMtDt_0Z14K_p_ptnId_6KYRZ PMD on META.v2_DocumentMetaData_0Z14K = PMD.v2_DocumentMetaData_0Z14K WHERE META.status_TDES0 = 'Final' AND FINFO.modelId = '967b9d88-a0d3-4b98-a1ce-e8767a5867ed' AND PMD.idNumber_9LV7R = '<%=PatientId%>' ORDER BY dateadd(minute,FINFO.dateSubmitted_Ofst,FINFO.dateSubmitted) DESC) AND NA.FullSummary_49U#$ IS NOT NULL

section.name: WICDiagnosis
section.query: SELECT DTL.ClinicalImpression_7Z#Q5 FROM v2_WIC#TreatmentForm_4HDAY TMT INNER JOIN v2_WICTrFr_4HDAY_FnClIm_C7COZ DTL ON TMT.v2_WIC#TreatmentForm_4HDAY = DTL.v2_WIC#TreatmentForm_4HDAY INNER JOIN v_Document DOC ON DOC.documentId = TMT.DOCUMENTID WHERE DOC.documentId = (SELECT TOP 1 META.DOCUMENTID As DocumentID FROM dbo.v2_DocumentMetaData_0Z14K META INNER JOIN dbo.DocumentIdentifier DI on DI.DOCUMENTID = META.DOCUMENTID INNER JOIN dbo.v_Document FINFO ON FINFO.DocumentId = META.DocumentId INNER JOIN dbo.v2_DcmMtDt_0Z14K_p_ptnId_6KYRZ PMD on META.v2_DocumentMetaData_0Z14K = PMD.v2_DocumentMetaData_0Z14K WHERE META.status_TDES0 = 'Final' AND PMD.idNumber_9LV7R = '<%=PatientId%>' ORDER BY dateadd(minute,FINFO.dateSubmitted_Ofst,FINFO.dateSubmitted) DESC)

section.name: MedManagement
section.query: select prescribingTerm + ' - ' + ISNULL(frequency,'') from MedicationPrescription where patientIdentifier in ('<%=PatientId%>') and patientNamespace = 'OHCP' and status IN ('ACTIVE','CHANGED')

section.name: ReferralReason
section.query: SELECT rr.Comments FROM OH_CM_Custom.dbo.vw_ccr_referral_content rr WHERE rr.ACTPASID = '<%=ExternalEventId%>'

section.name: AllergiesandAlerts
section.query: SELECT ISNULL(reaction,'not specified') FROM orion_allergiesalerts WHERE patientid in ('<%=PatientId%>','<%=PatientIdList%>')

section.name: SummaryOfManagementCCR
section.defaultTitle: Summary Of Management C C R
section.query: SELECT 'Patient Health Status:' + na.S_PatientHealthStatus_5FAT3 + ';' + 'Primary Diagnosis:' + na.S_PrimaryDiagnosis_K3P6T FROM dbo.v_AllDocumentIdentifier AS ad INNER JOIN dbo.v2_CN#NursingAssessment_DC688 AS na ON na.DOCUMENTID = ad.documentId INNER JOIN dbo.v_Document AS FormInfo ON FormInfo.documentId = na.DOCUMENTID INNER JOIN dbo.v2_DocumentMetaData_0Z14K AS meta ON meta.DOCUMENTID = FormInfo.documentId INNER JOIN dbo.v2_DcmMtDt_0Z14K_p_ptnId_6KYRZ AS pat ON pat.v2_DocumentMetaData_0Z14K = meta.v2_DocumentMetaData_0Z14K where pat.idNumber_9LV7R = ('<%=PatientId%>')
